text: Niscaya allahe muminasakalara paraa sihamtara jirana arau sampada kini laiche (iyara binimayata) ye, sihamtara babe ache jannata. Sihamte allahara pathata yud'dha karae, arasesata sihamte (satrauka) marae arau nije'o marae. Eteke ta'oraata, injila arau kora'anata e'i bisaye sihamtara satya pratisrauti ache; arau nija pratijna palanata allahatakai sraestha ana kona ache? Seye tomaloke allahara lagata yi beca-kina karaicha tara babe anandita horaa; arau e'itorae'i haiche mahasaphalata
